dmca.title: Copyright infringement
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: legal@juggmaster.com [mailto:legal@juggmaster.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 07, 2005 6:44 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright infringement
Importance: High

To those concerned,

We are hereby making you aware that one of your clients at IP ADDESS
67.18.6.229  (cinemajuggs.com) is posting and linking to copyrighted
materials stolen from others sites. They are aware that the materials are
copyrighted as in many instances, the copyright notice is clearly posted on
the image.

Examples of such infringements are available at

http://www.cinemajuggs.com/forum/showthread.php?s=&threadid=28960
http://www.cinemajuggs.com/forum/showthread.php?s=&threadid=28570

As we are the sole individuals authorized to post the material from our
site, the postings on this site are clearly not authorized by us

Their contact informatio taken from the site is

Tech, administration           Scotty: info@cinemajuggs.com - ICQ: 6965914
Backup if Scotty is away:  The_Cub: The_Cub@Hooters.DK

We would appreciate your assistance in getting this stolen material removed

CA Cooley
legal@juggmaster.com
